description: This file defines a Python class 'TodoistTools' that provides an interface for interacting with Todoist tasks and projects via the 'todoist_api_python' library. It includes methods for creating, retrieving, updating, closing, deleting tasks, and fetching active tasks and projects.

classes.name: TodoistTools
classes.description: A toolkit for interacting with Todoist tasks and projects, extending the 'Toolkit' base class.

methods.name: create_task
methods.description: Creates a new task in Todoist with specified content, project, due date, priority, and labels.

methods.name: get_task
methods.description: Retrieves a specific task by its ID.

methods.name: update_task
methods.description: Updates an existing task with provided parameters such as content, description, labels, due date, etc.

methods.name: delete_task
methods.description: Deletes a task by its ID.
